mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.name AS "name", a.sort AS "sort", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.code AS "code", a.address AS "address", a.longitude AS "longitude", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.point AS "point", a.zip_code AS "zipCode", a.master AS "master", a.phone AS "phone", a.fax AS "fax", a.email AS "email", a.usable AS "usable", a.industry AS "industry", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a6.name AS "area.name", o19.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a6 ON a6.id = a.area_id LEFT JOIN sys_office o19 ON o19.id = a.office_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_unit a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_unit( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, sort, area_id, code, address, longitude, latitude, point, zip_code, master, phone, fax, email, usable, industry, office_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{area.id}, #{code}, #{address}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{point}, #{zipCode}, #{master}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{usable}, #{industry}, #{office.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_unit SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, area_id = #{area.id}, code = #{code}, address = #{address}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, point = #{point}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, master = #{master}, phone = #{phone}, fax = #{fax}, email = #{email}, usable = #{usable}, industry = #{industry}, office_id = #{office.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
